mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'EQPT%' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CODE AS "code" , CODE_NAME AS "equipmentName" FROM TB_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'EQPT%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(CODE) ASC

SELECT RESERVE_NO as "reserveNo" , RESERVE_MEMO as "reserveMemo" , RESERVE_START as "reserveStart" , RESERVE_END as "reserveEnd" , USER_NO as "userNo" , EQUIPMENT_CODE as "equipmentCode" FROM RESERVATION WHERE (RESERVE_START >= TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_START <= TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (RESERVE_END >= TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_END <= TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (RESERVE_START < TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_END > TO_DATE(#{selectedDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE EQUIPMENT_CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM TB_GROUP WHERE CODE_NAME = #{equipmentName}) AND ( (RESERVE_START >= TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_START < TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (RESERVE_END > TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_END <= TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (RESERVE_START < TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND RESERVE_END > TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RESERVE_NO , RESERVE_MEMO , RESERVE_START , RESERVE_END , USER_NO , EQUIPMENT_CODE ) SELECT SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL , #{content} , TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , TO_DATE(#{reserveDate} || ' ' || #{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , #{userNo} , CODE FROM TB_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'EQPT%' AND CODE_NAME = #{equipmentName}
